DataElement.preferredName: FACT/GOG-Ntx Questionnaire Version 4 NTX11 How True Past Seven Days Have Difficulty Breathing When Exposed to Cold Temperatures Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how true in the past 7 days they have difficulty breathing when exposed to cold temperatures, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: FACT/GOG-Ntx Questionnaire How True Past Week Have Difficulty Breathing When Exposed to Cold Temperatures Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G developed specifically for evaluating platinum/paclitaxel-induced neurologic symptoms in patients with endometrial cancer._A question about an individual's agreement with a statement._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual has or had difficulty breathing when exposed to cold temperatures._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G developed specifically for evaluating platinum/paclitaxel-induced neurologic symptoms in patients with endometrial cancer.

Concepts.definition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G developed specifically for evaluating platinum/paclitaxel-induced neurologic symptoms in patients with endometrial cancer.

Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's agreement with a statement.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Have Difficulty Breathing When Exposed to Cold Temperatures
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had difficulty breathing when exposed to cold temperatures
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 0 (Not at all) to 4 (Very Much) on a Likert scale used on FACT questionnaires.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I have difficulty breathing w
ReferenceDocuments.description: I have difficulty breathing when I am exposed to cold temperatures

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. Where an investigator wants to use single Patient Reported Outcome items that are integrated into a study, DCP review is required prior to inclusion of the item on a case report form.
